ExternalBallistics.jl Documentation

Trajectory computation.

Introduction

julia> using ExternalBallistics

Package Features

  • MPMM direct and indirect

Functions Documentation

Objects generation

ExternalBallistics.createTargetRect — Function
creates a rectangular target by specifying the length a, the height b and the position (range)
source
ExternalBallistics.createTargetCirc — Function
creates a circular target by specifying the radius ρ and the position (range)
source
ExternalBallistics.createTarget — Function
Creates a target. Optional options are the size and the position
source
ExternalBallistics.createGun — Function
Creates a Gun by specifying the muzzle velocity its latitude, the elevation angle, azimuth angle and the twist. Optional options are the gun length and the height of the gun
source

Trajectory computation

ExternalBallistics.trajectoryMPMM — Function
computes the impact point, the velocity at impact and the time of flight by providing a projectile, a target, a gun and aerodynamic coefficient data.
optional options are the computational time, the constant R, the constant Ω, the wind velocity and the atmosphere.
The trajectory is computed using MPMM
source
ExternalBallistics.QEfinderMPMM! — Function
computes the elevation and azimuth a projectile, a target, a gun and aerodynamic coefficient data.
optional options are the computational time, the wind velocity and the atmosphere.
The trajectory is computed using MPMM
source

Types Documentation

ExternalBallistics.AbstractTarget — Type
abstract type under which target types are defined.
source
ExternalBallistics.AbstractPenetrator — Type
abstract type under which projectiles types are defined.
source
ExternalBallistics.Wind — Type
Wind is defined by the cross and range winds magnitude
source
ExternalBallistics.Projectile — Type
Projectile is defined by the following parameters: mass, calibre,
positionsion, velocity, tof, Ix, Iy, and Xcg
source
ExternalBallistics.TargetRect — Type
defines a rectangular target by specifying the lenght a, the height b and the position (range)
source
ExternalBallistics.TargetCirc — Type
defines a circular target by specifying the radius ρ and the position (range)
source
ExternalBallistics.Air — Type
defines the atmosphere by specifying the pressure, temperature and relative humidity
source
ExternalBallistics.Gun — Type
Gun is defined by the muzzle velocity, the latitude, the twist, the gun length, the height, the elevation and azimuth
source
